cards.headline: Community Question- Where are the Iranians in your country?

cards.text: Please introduce us to the Iranian experience in your country. Where do Iranians live? What unique experiences do they  have in your country? Take us to a restaurant, a grocery, or an art event.
Using no more than 5 photos, show us something about the Iranian experience.

goals: Capture an image of a typically Iranian place.
Show us what Iranians do in this place.
Shoot a portrait of an Iranian, or show us two Iranians interacting together.
Get close, show us something typically Iranian.
Show us one more Iranian in your community.

cards.text: Thanks for your help. After you click 'Publish' on the next card, be sure to write a short description about your photo set. 3-5 sentences will be sufficient.

title: Show us the Iranian Community in your country.
